title: OT 30: Comment Knowledge
summary:
Key ideas:
- This is an open thread post, where people can post anything and ask random questions.
- The author proposes the question of whether these open threads should be done weekly instead of biweekly.
- The author forbids John Sidles from using bold text or a specific sentence structure.

Key learnings:
- There are no specific learnings proposed in this post.

Key questions:
- Should the open thread posts be done weekly instead of biweekly?
